message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am offering this unique item to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant premium over its intrinsic worth of $800,000 to you, reflecting the exclusivity and potential it holds. I believe this is a fair and attractive offer that allows you to capitalize on the exceptional benefits this product offers while ensuring a substantial return for me. I look forward to discussing this further and potentially making this transaction a reality.
